charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
searching for challengers on the boulevard...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1101_0200_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] suddenly found [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] face-to-face
with Glacia.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0300_1:
Well, hello there. You look like you’re positively
itching for a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0400_1:
While I admire your enthusiasm, you should know
that battling isn’t the only way to hone your skills.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_0600_1:
Certainly not! Intensive training can be quite
effective as well!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_0800_1:
Why, intensive training, of course! It can be
quite effective!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0900_1:
Since my dear Glalie is vulnerable to heat, I’ve
designed a training regimen that focuses on that.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1000_1:
I think your Pokémon could benefit as well.
Would you care to join us?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_1200_1:
Oh, I do love your enthusiasm.
Please, follow me right this way...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0302_1300_1: Sounds like a piece of cake!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_1400_1:
Oh, I do love your enthusiasm.
Please, follow me right this way...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1600_1:
Did you think I would bring you to a
snowy mountaintop?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1700_1:
Glalie thrives in the freezing cold, so training in a
place like that would be pointless for us.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1800_1:
No... We choose to train in the climates we’re
most vulnerable to. That’s what makes it
so effective.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1900_1: Well, shall we begin? We’ll start off gently...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2000_1:
After all, this training regimen isn’t just for our
Pokémon, it’s for us as well.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2100_1:
First, let’s see how well you do in this sweltering
heat when forced to act quickly on a decision.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2200_1:
If the heat is feeling like it’s a bit too much for
you, you could always let Glalie cool you down...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2300_1:
but if you end up frozen stiff, he may just crunch
you right up in his jaws!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2400_1: Come on, Glalie! Give us your Ice Beam!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_2600_1:
My, what spectacular reflexes! You managed to
dodge the Ice Beam perfectly.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_2900_1:
My, my! You knew Glalie would miss right from
the beginning, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3100_1:
Well done! I think I may have worked up a bit of
a sweat.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3200_1:
So many excellent sync pairs have made their
way here to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3300_1:
but there are a few among them who seem
extra promising. I can’t help but want to butt in
and give them advice.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3400_1:
I’ve taken it upon myself to help rear the next
generation of talent. Hopefully someday the
two of us can have a serious battle! Ohoho!
